mapper.select: select distinct a.name,a.code,a.specification,a.InventoryDescript,a.idunit from AA_Inventory a where a.id = #{0}
select a.id from AA_Inventory a where a.code = #{0}
select distinct a.code from AA_Inventory a where a.id = #{0}
